name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger Character Song (Tohka)
detailed_description:
Tohka's character theme for the Grisaia: Phantom Trigger series.
All tracks are in both WAV and MP3 formats.

1. Clover

　Vocals: Tohka(CV. Ayane Sakura)
　Composition & Arrangement: Hitoshi Fujima(Elements Garden)
　Lyrics: Yoshikazu Kuwashima

　Bass: Ryutaro Fujinaga (Elements Garden)
　Guitar: Hitoshi Fujima

　All other Instruments & Programming： Hitoshi Fujima

　Mixed by Eiichi Nishizawa
　Directed by Hitoshi Fujima
　Recorded at ARIA studio
　Sound Produced by Elements Garden
　Production Management: Asami Suita (ARIA entertainment)


2. Clover(instrumental)

3. Clover(short size)

4. Clover(short size)(Instrumental)

Note:
These audio tracks are downloaded as DLC, and are saved to the same destination folder as the game files.
To check the destination folder, right-click on the "Grisaia Phantom Trigger Vol.5.5" icon in your Steam library, and select Properties. Then click on the Local Files tab, then select "Browse Local Files".

WAV:44.1kHz 16bit
MP3:192kbps
